Rulings.Edison: ● This card can only be used to negate the summon of a Monster(s) while there is no ongoing chain. It can negate Summons like that of "Cyber Dragon", but not monsters summoned by "Call of the Haunted".
Rulings.Tengu: ● This card can only be used to negate the summon of a Monster(s) while there is no ongoing chain. It can negate Summons like that of "Cyber Dragon", but not monsters summoned by "Call of the Haunted".

Rulings.Base: 1. This card activates at the same timing as "Horn of Heaven" or "Solemn Judgment". It does not target.

PSCT.Edison: ① If a Monster(s) would be Summoned while you control an "X-Saber" Monster, and there is no ongoing Chain: Negate the Summon, and if you do, destroy it.
PSCT.Tengu: ① If a Monster(s) would be Summoned while you control an "X-Saber" Monster, and there is no ongoing Chain: Negate the Summon, and if you do, destroy it.
